title: Till how much rankings can one get nits? - Quora

response.answer_text: It depends on quite a lot of factors First and foremost being which NIT you targeting of course Besides that there are other aspects CategoryHome state /Other stateTarget branchRoughly speaking to get into any of the top 4 NITs namely Trichy Suratkal Warangal and Calicut You would require a rank within 6000 or 7000 for any top branches and within 20000 for the less common branches, with home state quota in General Category and around 3000 to 4000 in other state quota. In terms of OBC home state top branches go up to 14000 15000 while other branches ranges from around 20000 till 40–45000 depending upon the branches offered. For other state category it is 6000–7000 and around 20000 respectively.

It depends on the stream, category as well as your home state. Also it depends on the nit that you want. Like the new ones of Sikkim etc close at 1.5L and the old ones like trichy, Warangal close at 20k.By closing I mean the last seat to be occupied. Well it is absolutely meaningless if you go to the new nits as you don't get the feel of being in an nit nor placements and nor you have the faculty to boost of. So strive for less than 30k rank. All the best:-)
